remarks: The intersection of two filters is a filter.  Use ~ fiint to extend this property to the intersection of a finite set of filters.  Paragraph 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p.  I.36.  (Contributed by FL, 17-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
statement: infil $p |- ( ( F e. ( Fil ` X ) /\ G e. ( Fil ` X ) ) -> ( F i^i G ) e. ( Fil ` X ) ) $.
